desc: Baked by Adelina is an artisan dessert company founded by Adelina and her daughters Kristin-Marie & Danielle. Combining a reverence for the beautiful history of their familial recipes with their affinity for modern elevated flavors, Baked by Adelina brings the tradition and nostalgia of artisan desserts to a new level.

layout.text: Helping you express your gratitude & leave meaningful impressions with gifts of artisan desserts
